casebody.data:
No. 1097. No. 1219. No. 1226. No. 1227. Hawkins et al. v. United States; Reser v. Fleming, Temporary Controls Administrator; Texasteel Manufacturing Co. et al. v. Seaboard Surety Co.; and Armstrong et al. v. Seaboard Surety Co. June 16, 1947.

Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or decision of these applications.
